data.name: LASHEK
data.detailed_description:
LASHEK is a psychological horror game in which you have to solve the mystery of a little boy's family mansion and help the protagonist get out of the horror in which he finds himself. Try to reveal the terrifying secret of the house, and at the same time not lose your mind or die from the horror of what is happening around. Remember that someone is guarding secrets, and it is likely that this keeper will not be happy with your curiosity.

You only get one chance, try it! Who knows what awaits you around the next corner ...


In the game itself, the player can interact with objects, choose the path to follow, and also immerse themselves in the game's plot.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Make up your mind to enter the LASHEK family home and solve its mystery!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-5200U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 940M
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
